text:
In the following text I am going to explain why I am studing in the information and communication licence.
The beggining of the explication is quite simple.
I have, in my family, a little brother who’s playing rugby since the age of seven.
At first, I was’nt really concern by his sport. Little by little, I start following his different performances. One day, I was watching a game of his team, and, in the rugby club where He was playing, there was a girl team.
My mother and I talk with the coach and the next week I was in the team.
This was the beggining of a love story.
I start to play rugby seven times a week and even became team’s captain.
When the time to choose what I would like to study after highschool comes, I had only rugby in mind so I started to think of a job that will include it.
Obviously, I can not choose the option of professional athlete because women in rugby are not paid.
So I had to focus on what studies I can do.
In the sport, not everybody can pay or even go to the game of their team. sport is essentially diffuse by medias.
I realised that work in communication will allow me to have contact with rugby or sport in general.
So, basically, I had requesting to the Parcoursup platform to study in a Bachelor formation but there was too many resquest for the place proposed.
So the only solution was the university. At first, I had a lot of pain to accept the fact of leaving my family, my friends and leave in an foreign town, but I think now that is the best formation I could chose.
It offers a lot of things I like such as philosophy, sociology and the study of human behavior.
